info.description: This is a restaurant management system API with user authentication, food ordering, and invoice management
info.title: Restaurant Management API

post.description: Authenticate user with email and password, returns JWT access token

200.description: Login successful with authentication token and user details

post.description: Register a new user account with email, password, and profile information

201.description: User created successfully with authentication token

400.description: Invalid request body or validation error

409.description: Email already exists in the system

get.description: Get authenticated user profile details (requires valid JWT token)

200.description: User profile details (password field will be empty)

get.description: Retrieve a complete list of all available food items in the restaurant

200.description: Array of all food items with details

post.description: Create a new food item in the restaurant menu (Admin only)

parameters.description: Food item details (name, price, image, menu_id)
parameters.name: food

201.description: Food created successfully with generated ID

400.description: Invalid request body or validation failed

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific food item using its unique ID

put.description: Update an existing food item's information (Admin only)

400.description: Invalid ID format or request body

delete.description: Permanently delete a food item from the menu (Admin only)

get.description: Retrieve a list of all invoices
Retrieve a specific invoice by its ID
Retrieve a list of all menus
Retrieve a specific menu by its ID
Retrieve order items, optionally filtered by order ID
Retrieve a specific order item by its ID

delete.description: Delete an order item by ID

get.description: Retrieve a list of all orders
Retrieve a specific order by its ID
Retrieve a list of all restaurant tables
Retrieve a specific table by its ID
